definition: lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: As an example of deaerator system, the basic modularization modeling method is presented.
sentences.chinese: 以除氧器系统为例，给出了模块化建模基本方法。
把一些事情都模块化了。

sentences.english: Project management can also benefit from modularisation.
sentences.chinese: 模块化也可给项目管理带来方便。

sentences.english: It is an evolution of distributed computing and modular programming.
sentences.chinese: 它是分布式计算和模块化编程的发展。

sentences.english: The total design of the modularized Air-cooled heat pump micro-computer controller .
sentences.chinese: 模块化风冷热泵冷水机组微电脑控制器总体设计。

sentences.english: Because the code is modular, it is easier to write and maintain.
sentences.chinese: 由于代码是模块化的，因此更容易编写和维护。

sentences.english: And it also presents the design idea of modularization and seriation.
sentences.chinese: 提出了模块化系列设计思想。

sentences.english: Modularization to reduce the dependency on large, monolithic classpaths.
sentences.chinese: 模块化，减少较大的整体类路径上的依赖项。

sentences.english: By using subVIs, you can make your block diagrams modular and more manageable.
sentences.chinese: 利用子VI，使得程序模块化且便于管理。

sentences.english: It also helps in understanding business functions and modularization efforts.
sentences.chinese: 它还有助于了解业务功能和模块化工作。

sentences.english: First of all, notice the modularity.
Modern table lamp with bright LED lights and modular structure.
sentences.chinese: 一款带有明亮的LED灯光和模块化结构的时髦台灯。

sentences.english: Attempts to modularize security concerns have been ongoing for many years.
sentences.chinese: 安全方面模块化的尝试已经是有些年了。

sentences.english: As you can see, shipping containers meet these modularity considerations quite well.
sentences.chinese: 可以看到，集装箱很好地满足了这些模块化考量。

sentences.english: Modular construction for rapid in-field servicing.
sentences.chinese: 模块化结构，快速的服务领域。

sentences.english: Using advanced Down Lamp light dissipation technology and modular design.
sentences.chinese: 采用先进的筒灯配光技术，模块化设计。
